timeline.title: Chief Financial Officer
timeline.text: I was elected as C.F.O. of Google Developer Student Clubs at Holy Angel University.

timeline.title: Freelance Online Tutor
timeline.text: I teach different programming languages to Junior Highschool Students online.

timeline.title: Chief Technology Officer
timeline.text: I was elected as C.T.O. of Google Developer Student Clubs at Holy Angel University.

timeline.title: Councilor for Financial Management
timeline.text: I was elected as School of Computing College Student Councilor for Financial Management at Holy Angel University.

timeline.title: Film Cinematographer
timeline.text: I was a Film Cinematographer, Videographer, and Editor for Silang Productions on Cinemasigla 2018.
